sentences.english: The Kansas City broadband plan is well advanced.
sentences.chinese: 堪萨斯城宽频项目如今进展顺利。

sentences.english: Understand the trend and application of broadband circuits for optical communications.
sentences.chinese: 了解光通讯用宽频电路之趋势与应用。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a method to generate square wave of high resolving power and wide frequency range.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种高分辨率宽频域方波脉冲的产生方法。

sentences.english: Diagnose common problems that impact last-mile broadband networks.
sentences.chinese: 诊断常见的问题，影响最后一英里宽频网络。

sentences.english: The utility model provides a sound absorption assembled plate of a wide frequency band;
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型提供一种宽频带组合式吸声板。

sentences.english: Broaden students' knowledge of broadband circuits for optical communications.
sentences.chinese: 增广光通讯用宽频电路的知识。

sentences.english: So the F. C. C. proposes to redefine broadband as a telecommunications service.
sentences.chinese: 因此，联邦通讯委员会建议重新界定宽频电讯服务。

sentences.english: Hong Kong Broadband’s principal competitor is an older company, PCCW, which has several other lines of business, including phone, television and mobile.
sentences.chinese: 香港宽频的主要竞争对手是一家老牌企业，电讯盈科。

sentences.english: How are broadband services different from traditional dial-up services?
sentences.chinese: 宽频好吗服务不同的传统国内拨接式数据通信服务？

sentences.english: As an important form of wide-band dual polarization antenna, the four-arm sinuous antenna has been widely used in EW equipments.
sentences.chinese: 四臂正弦天线是一种用途广泛的宽频带双极化天线。

sentences.english: Algeria - Telecoms, Mobile, Broadband and Forecasts.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚的通讯，行动，宽频市场。

sentences.english: A novel broadband cylindrically conformal microstrip antenna with a single substrate is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新型的单层介质宽频带圆柱共形微带天线。

sentences.english: WiMax processes all the information in a wide channel.
sentences.chinese: WiMax在一个宽频里处理所有信息。

sentences.english: The practical bandwidth is good enough to keep up with cheap broadband.
sentences.chinese: 实际带宽足以满足一般的宽频带。

sentences.english: Despite its low prices, Hong Kong Broadband now operates in the black.
sentences.chinese: 即便价格如此低廉，香港宽频却还是实现了持续盈利。

sentences.english: K band wideband coaxial-to-waveguide transducer is described, ts VSWR.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种K波段宽频带同轴波导转换器。

pinyin: gao1 qing1 shu4 zi4 dian4 shi4

definition: set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
standard definition (TV or video image quality)
